newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: YTL sets 4.0 rgt a share for power IPO.
newsitem.headline: YTL sets 4.0 rgt a share for power IPO.

text.p: YTL Corp Bhd said on Tuesday it has set a price of 4.00 ringgit a share for the institutional issue of new shares in the public offering of its power generation unit.
In a statement, the Malaysian infrastructure developer and power concern said the retail issue price for YTL Power International Bhd will be 3.40 ringgit a share.
YTL said the restricted offer for sale of YTL Power shares by YTL will also be priced at 3.40 ringgit a share.
YTL has previously said it planned to list its power generation unit under a restructuring scheme which include acquisitions of its power generation units by YTL Power.
